summary: A utility script that connects to the Library of Congress FTP server, retrieves MARC record files, parses them (using XML utilities), and updates the Open Library catalog with the new or changed bibliographic data. It includes helper routines for FTP login, file transfer, block reading, and error handling for bad imports, driven by configuration settings.
